Package me.hapyl.spigotutils.module.util

Class EternaRunnable

java.lang.Object
me.hapyl.spigotutils.module.util.EternaRunnable
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Record, Replay
public abstract class EternaRunnable extends Object implements Runnable
A BukkitRunnable implementation without throwing random errors.
